content.short_description: Marketing maven Kelly Jones wreaks havoc on NASA launch director Cole Davis's already difficult task. When the White House deems the mission too important to fail, the countdown truly begins.
content.notes: A fun trip back in time to an event that never ceases to fill me with wonder. Fly Me to the Moon is another solid entry from Apple. The story is told well, and the characters are well acted. I really enjoyed the pacing, which gave the characters life, and made the setting feel lived in. Visually, it di a good job of instilling awe. All told, it was a very solid movie, and Im glad I watched it.
